Today we are glad to announce that Serenity Financial has a new partner — HDForex broker. HDForex team understands the industry issues like no other and supports the project which will make Forex more transparent. Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Hello. Serenity Financial is an interesting and useful project. I don’t want to say anything bad about this project, but as for me, I don’t like the approach to resolving disputes between a trader and a broker. Arbitrators are specialists of the company, so I can’t be sure of the objectivity of the decision. After all, a broker can bribe an arbitrator, and a trader won’t have the financial ability to do the same. Of course, it is not a fact that this will happen, but everything is possible. I would like very much the developers to reconsider this point.

Author: bit679
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Greetings. I don’t know why do you think so, but Serenity staff won’t resolve the disputes. The resolution of the dispute is divided into two stages: the conflict analysis by the Verify My Trade system and, in case of dissatisfaction with the decision in the first stage, the dispute resolution by the FinCom specialist. As you can see, the result of solving any disputable situation will be an objective decision.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Ahaaa, that's the different story. I like this approach much more. But it's not entirely clear to me: it turns out that one of the parties can appeal the decision of the dispute at the first stage, but what about the second stage? There are no processes after it. It turns out that the decision of a specialist can’t be appealed.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: 7marketz CEO Yagub Rahimov became the Key Advisor of Serenity Financial    Serenity Financial keeps on growing and getting empowered by the day. We are honored to introduce our new Key Advisor, Yagub Rahimov, Co-founder and CEO of 7marketz Inc Group. He has assisted a number of successful ICOs to reach their goals and has been investing in cryptocurrencies since 2009. Yagub brings expertise from Financial Markets and Blockchain perspective, empowering the Serenity team.   «I have been nominated and awarded Best Trader of the Year title a number of times since 2005. During this period, I believe I could have achieved more if my counterparty (brokers) were more transparent with their pricing. I’m confident that Serenity Financial has the potential to become the solution I wished for.  Imagine, you are entering a position and your broker gives you a massive slippage. You naturally send a complaint, expecting the broker to return your loss, but in return the broker replies — ”your order was filled in by the market price”, providing no proof at all. Alternatively, like in many cases, a trader submits a claim and although the answer does not satisfy them, the broker would not be at fault. For scenarios like this, traders, as well as brokers, need a middle party to operate as an arbitrator. Serenity Financial will become that missing piece of the puzzle for the Financial markets».   Short Bio:  Yagub Rahimov is the CEO and a co-founder at 7marketz Inc., the parent company of AtoZForex.com, FintechEvents.Center and NewsOgram AI. From 2005 he has founded a number of companies in 18 countries that specialize in alternative investment channels and machine learning.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Serenity traders will check their trades with Verify My Trade feature    It is the time when we start releasing information about how our service works and its main features. For example, with Serenity Financial, traders will be able to find out whether their trade was fairly priced or not. This feature will be implemented thanks to Verify My Trade analytical service.  How Verify My Trade works  Verify My Trade consolidates price feeds from various brokers, stores them in a repository and segments trades based on the execution quality at any given second of the trading week.  The service is free of charge. If you see that your broker has interfered with your trading and closed your trade at an incorrect price, you will be able to appeal to Serenity. Committee members will act as arbitrators between you and the broker and you will be able to get your funds back. Learn more about how the service works on Verify My Trade website.  Verification of trades is just a fraction of the services we will offer.  Follow our news!

Body: Technical analysis research house Trading Central joins Serenity Financial     Many professionals support Serenity project. Trading Central, an independent technical analysis research house, is now among them.  Trading Central Global Head of Solutions Julien Heiderscheid, who personally supports Serenity said that the project presents a very important idea for the industry: creating conditions for safe trading on financial markets. Serenity will also keep the demand for cryptocurrencies elevated thanks to the huge volumes of Forex market and the fact that its future clients will need coins to purchase Serenity services.  Trading Central operates from 1999. It offers video analytics, trading signals, and investments strategies. Trading Central team of analysts received the largest number of professional awards in the world.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Hello, few stages:  At the first stage of reviewing the claim, the trades in question are automatically analyzed with “Verify My Trade” system. Second,Then the system make the decision. Third, If the broker and/or the client don’t agree with the results of the trade’s automatic analysis, they may appeal to Financial Commission. It’s a paid service(you can pay by tokens). FinaCom experts receive all the data connected to the trade’s execution, request additional documents from the client and/or broker if necessary, and announce the final decision. This ruling can not be appealed.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: IQ Option joins Serenity Financial   During Finance Magnates London Summit, a major Binary Options broker IQ Option confirmed participation in the project.  According to Dmitry Zaretsky, Founder of IQ Option, their team always invests in fintech development. Everything that can change the outdated standards of the financial industry is worthy of attention and support. Serenity project has come up with a great idea of how to utilize blockchain in the Forex and Binary Options industry to protect funds and increase transparency. For that reason Serenity may become one of the main events of the next year.  IQ option will be among the first brokers that will increase security for their clients who trade Binary Options by starting to provide services through Serenity platform, where all trades will be recorded in blockchain and funds will be stored on smart contracts.  *Finance Magnates London Summit is a major industry event that has been welcoming major financial and fintech companies every year since 2009.  IQ Option is one of the fastest growing online trading platforms. The company’s monthly turnover is $11 000 000 000.

This means we will need to have segregated accounts (for FCA regulation), registered capital, etc. We will start this only after we finish the base part of our system, the software part, etc. If we take into account segregated accounts fund, we might need dozens of USD millions for that, so we start this part of the project only after we reach more than $19 mln token sales.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: 5 hours left until the Pre-ICO. Buy SERENITY tokens with 50% discount   The pre-sale of our tokens starts in only 5 hours. During Pre-ICO tokens will be available at a 50% discount. Pre-ICO will run until the 30th of November.  Register on Serenity website to participate.  About SERENITY tokens   Token nominal value — 0,1 ETH.   Utility token type   The fact that clients must pay for 50% to 100% of the company services with tokens will support the token liquidity   Tokens will be accepted at a cost not lower than their nominal value or at a market value if it is higher.   Tokens spent on SERENITY services will be withdrawn from circulation and destroyed.   After ICO tokens will be freely trading on the exchange. Listing on Bittrex exchange is already negotiated.    About the project  Meanwhile, it is the time to remember about our achievements. Here’s what we have done up to this moment.  Why do we need Serenity?  Serenity project will fight fraud in Forex market. Serenity will unite traders and brokers from around the world. Thanks to depository system and blockchain technology, Serenity can guarantee fairness of all trades and withdrawal of funds. Serenity will also act as an arbitrator in disputes.  Our smart contract is available on GitHub  Everyone can check Serenity Financial smart contract on GitHub.  10 advisors support us and the number is growing  Serenity Financial is supported by the professional community. Our advisors are: Dmitry Rannev, Head of AMTS Solutions, Founder of Tools For Brokers Aleksey Kutsenko. Crypto Attorney Julia Mihalchuk, developer of investment services and platforms Dmitry Orlov, co-founder of CryptoCurrency World Expo Łukasz Paszkiewicz and others.  Here’s what Dmitry Rannev said about the project:  “I’ve always stood for transparent Forex. The project aims to increase transparency on the market, hence I support it. The idea is quite interesting and I think that it has all chances to evolve into something great”  Major financial companies support us  FinaCom, Larson&Holz, NAS Broker, Tools For Brokers, B2Broker, Carrax, Grand Capital, Faster Broker, UpTrader, XO Option are among our partners. In addition, a number of brokers have already agreed to become our first clients.  Mass Media about us  Articles about Serenity and reviews have been published in popular online media.  Press release on Coinspeaker CryptoInsider: How to improve the life of third world investors The Merkle: Serenity Financial is reinventing Forex Finance Magnates: Serenity Financial offering unrivaled level of customer protection KryptoMoney: how to make money on ICO TradingView: Serenity CEO knows when you need to buy Bitcoin Bits.Media: Why Serenity will change the Forex industry (in Russian)  We started negotiating our token listing on exchanges  We are already arranging listing of our tokens on Bittrex exchange and other crypto exchanges.  We are in ICO listings  Serenity is listed on ICOBench and ICO-list.  We've made videos about the project  Watch our brief but informative videos:  1-minute video about the project Serenity team about the impact the project will make on Forex.  Participated in the world expos and conferences  We presented the project on the major financial and blockchain expos in Russia, China, Britain, Netherlands, Indonesia, UAE, Kazakhstan and Ukraine. We told about each of them on our official Facebook page.  Participate in Pre-ICO

Body: So in other words, (commenting on your final point), you wish to set up a way for people to conduct escrow? I would definitely use this platform if that feature were included. I'll tell you my idea:  1> You've got all kinds of traders who provide signal services. But people don't want to pay unless they get signals. a> Trader sets up a service that sends signals and trades forex on this platform. b> Subscribers pay up front for the service. c> if the service triggers the platform smart contract requirement, then subscriber fee is released. d> if not, signals fail, then payment returned to subscriber.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Hello there!  - Category A Broker(stp)—providing repayment guarantees for the full amount of funds invested by the client, taking into account the profits/losses under completed transactions. These guarantees will be implemented by hedging trading risks through an open source and/or through the provided liquidity. - Category B Broker(dd)—guaranteeing the return of clients’ own deposited funds.

Body: How to become Serenity Financial bounty partner and how much you can earn  Our Pre-ICO starts as early as the 15th of November. Why not make some good money with the help of Serenity Financial? Here we present our Bounty Program.  What is a Bounty Program? The process is simple. You spread the word about Serenity Financial online and earn money with every action you take. You can join the program at any moment prior to the ICO end date.  How much can I earn? 3% of all company’s tokens sold will be allocated to the Bounty Program. It means that the maximum payout will be 10 500 ETH or $3 150 000. The funds will be divided among all program participants and transferred within one week after the ICO ends.  What will I need to do?  Our Bounty program has several options. For example, you can share posts from the official Serenity social media accounts, place banners on your website, help us with media publications.  Here is the payout percentage you can count on:  BTT signature campaign — 35% Bitcointalk Translation and Thread Moderation — 15% Twitter reposts — 5% Facebook reposts –10% Help with media publications & Blog articles — 10% Forex forum threads — 3% Banner campaign — 10% Financial forum signature campaign — 2% YouTube campaign –10%  Just choose the option that suits you the best. Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: By arbitration we mean resolving disputes between broker and client (not to be confused with economic "arbitrage" - simultaneous buying and selling of the same asset at different markets).  Our platform acts as an independent blockchain-based regulator, controlling the relations between Forex brokers and their clients, allowing clients to be safe even when working with offshore brokerages.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Hi EduardoSe,  We will soon publish our bounty conditions. Please follow our updates to learn about that.   what is abitration trader and broker, youre mean broker forex  Recording of trades in blockchain is one of the basic functionalities of the platform. Thus, when brokers are connected to the platform, clients' trades are being recorded, which eliminates the possibility of backdating transactions. If honesty of a transaction is being questioned, we look at the records and the arbitration committee, which is comprised of industry professionals, makes the verdict.   how to play  A trader registers on Serenity platform and chooses any broker connected to the system. The trader then purchases tokens and their funds go to the depository, thus the broker doesn't have access to them. The broker provides the trader with an equivalent account balance, which is used for trading. When the trader wishes to withdraw funds, they submit a request through Serenity platform. If the broker denies withdrawal of funds, Serenity has the ability to make the broker do that.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Honesty in the Forest market. How is that possible?   The headline of this article expresses the public opinion that the Forex market is a big hoax.  The reason is simple: most brokers do everything so that the clients would lose their money.  Let's be honest: Well, what a sensible financier, economist, businessman taking from you $ 100, would add 99,900 dollars to an incomprehensible person who has just learned to trade?   Moreover, it is well known, that most brokers do not teach you to trade in the market. They explain how difficult it is to constantly monitor quotes offering the services of traders whose goal is to bring money to the company, not to you.  Let's get the specifics. How does a broker make his millions? Transaction commissions. Customers' losses due to dramatically changed prices. Commission for the transaction postponement until the following day.  Did you catch the point? CLIENTS' LOSSES. Therefore, nobody but you is interested in your benefit. It’s only your goal to be "in the black." Therefore, this leads to the conclusion that broker makes a profit, when you lose money, your balance, deposit, funds on the account - whatever you want to call it. It’s vitally important for brokers that you lose money, which means having the opportunity to influence the quotes and prices that you see in your trading terminal. In their favor.  Working in the Forex market and having experience in developing software products for the market, Serenity-financial.io was able to develop a platform for controlling brokers and protecting traders. Each transaction is recorded in a distributed ledger and cannot be changed. Any controversial transaction that is opened by the broker and pulls the trader in the negatives is canceled within 24 hours.  The value for brokers is also obvious - your customers will come and trade just because all transactions are transparent, and any change is prohibited by blockchain. Due to client’s trading brokers have an opportunity to make a profit in the form of spread. As for clients they have a guarantee of honesty of the broker.  We appreciate your feedback, feel free to leave comments and subscribe to serenity-financial.io newsletter. We send only up-to-date information about the project and the Forex industry. Significant information for investors. There is an opportunity to triple your capital at the expense of the forthcoming ICO of our project. Keep in touch.  Your Serenity Financial team

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: The arbitration platform will address the problem of transparent and secure trading on financial markets for millions of traders around the world! Become an ambassador of Serenity Financial platform for the whole world to know about the project and receive a generous reward! We distribute 3% of Serenity tokens among all who popularize the project because we believe in the power of words and your opinion!  Numbers: The collective number of tokens that will be issued is 3 500 000, nominal value of each token is 0,1 Ethereum. 3% from the total number of tokens sold will be distributed among Bounty participants.  Bounty Rules: 1. Everyone must open an account in order to get the bounty 2. You will be asked to provide an ETH address for the reward – MAKE SURE YOU HOLD ITS PRIVATE KEYS! 3. Twitter counter – The Twitter counter takes up to an hour to sync; in order to get the counter working you must first Follow the Serenity user, and then start retweeting TWITTER COUNTER TRACKS AND COUNTS ONLY YOURS RETWEETS OF @ICOSerenity TWEETS!! IF YOU RETWEET @Serenity IT WILL NOT BE COUNTED! 4. Facebook counter – This counter is operating externally; it will be pending until the campaign ends 5. Signature campaign – Put your Bitcointalk user profile link under "Link" 6. All custom bounties (Signatures, blog, ambassadors and Misc) will be pending until the end of the campaign, and replaced by final numbers 7. Have fun  After you have created an account, just spread information about Serenity ICO in crypto-community as wide as possible by following the simple instructions in this post. By completing bounty tasks you will receive bounty-stakes, which are divided into the following categories: Twitter, Facebook, Bitcointalk signature campaign, Bitcointalk translation and moderation, writing blog posts and posting articles in popular media. At the end of ICO we will distribute 105 000 Serenity points proportionally to your bounty stakes in each category.  o   BTT signature campaign – 35% o      Bitcointalk Translation and Thread Moderation — 15% o   Twitter reposts –5% o   Facebook reposts – 10% o   Help with media publications & Blog articles – 10% o   Forex forum treads – 3% o   Banner campaign – 10% o   Financial forum signature campaign – 2% o   YouTube campaign – 10%  1. Bitcointalk Translation and Thread Moderation — 15%  For the translation and thread moderation please write here https://t.me/SerenityFinancial You will receive 40 coins for an ANN translation, 20 coins for our “big post” translation and 5 coins per page in your thread.    2. Twitter follow & Reposts – 5%  1.   Follow our official page on Twitter 2.   Log in to Serenity account at any time during the campaign (all your retweets will be registered in any case) 3.   Connect Twitter and Serenity in your account page (‘connect with Twitter’ button). You need to retweet news marked with #ICOSerenity from our official account within 5 days after their publication and not later, and do not delete them until the ICO ends. Each retweet will earn you the following amount of points: o   From 20 to 30 followers – 1 point o   From 30 to 99 followers – 10 points o   From 100 to 249 followers – 25 points o   From 250 to 999 followers – 60 points o   From 1000 to 5000 followers – 120 points o   5001 followers and more – 250 points  The account must be at least 4 months old. The number of your followers is being fixed at the moment when you connect your account and doesn’t dramatically change during the campaign. NOTE: We count ONLY the posts that are marked with #ICOSerenity by our team. So, if you add our hashtag to any posts, it is not counted. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io   3. Facebook follow & Reposts – 10%  1.   Follow our official Facebook page 2.   Log in to Serenity Financial account 3.   Connect Facebook and Serenity Financial in your account page ("connect with Facebook" button) You need to repost news marked with #ICOSerenity from our official account within 5 days after their publication and not later, and do not delete them until the ICO. Each repost will earn you the following amount of points: o   From 20 to 30 followers – 1 point o   From 30 to 99 followers – 10 points o   From 100 to 249 followers – 25 points o   From 250 to 999 followers – 60 points o   From 1000 to 5000 followers – 120 points o   5001 followers and more – 250 points  The account must be at least 4 months old. The number of your followers is being fixed at the moment when you connect your account and doesn’t change during the campaign. NOTE: We count ONLY the posts that are marked with #ICOSerenity by our team. So, if you add our hashtag to any posts, it is not counted. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io   4. Bitcointalk signature campaign – 35%  We are happy to invite you to the Bitcointalk signature campaign. Just upload the signature and avatar provided by us and write at least 5 constructive posts a week. Conditions to earn stakes in this category:  o   A minimum of 5 constructive posts a week o    At least 1 post a week must be constructive and in the Serenity ANN thread o   As you apply, we define your rank, and it will not be changed o   To get signature rewards, you need at least 25 posts written o   We will ban and will not send Serenity points to spammers and multi accounts o   We don’t reward avatars, only as an addition to signatures o   Users not posting a minimum of 5 posts per week for 2 consecutive weeks will be removed o   Receiving negative trust or ban during your participation in our campaign will result in you being disqualified from our campaign receiving nothing o   If we feel you are making a lot of spam posts, you will be removed from the campaign and receive no payment o   Do not change signature during campaign  Each week completed will earn you the following stakes:  o   Legendary/Hero – 20 points o   Sr./Full – 15 points o   Member – 10 points o   Jr. Member – 5 points o   Avatar on – +5 points  Discussion Boards we do not count:  Games and round, Micro earnings, Politics and Society, Off-topic, Archival, Posts in "tipster" threads, Auctions, Lending, Beginners and help, Press, Investor based games. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io    5. Help us publish article in media (convenient option for journalists) & Blog articles – 15%  If you are a private user, please refer to Option 5. This option is for big media and trendsetters. You can help us create an article or video blog on a popular media website or outlet. For example, you can write an article about Serenity on Coindesk, Bitcoinist, CoinTelegraph or in any other media relevant to finances and cryptocurrency. We will class each article as standard (25 points), nice (90 points) or extraordinary (200 points depending on the media outlet and its reach. Please make sure, that you are ready to make an article and you are able to publish it in some popular media, and then apply through the form below. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io  If you are a big media or a trendsetter, please refer to Option 6. This option is for private users. Write a post about Serenity in any language, with at least 1000 characters and containing 2 links to serenity-financial.io We will class each article as standard (10 points), nice (25 points) or extraordinary (90 points). It can be your blog or your social net personal page, for example Facebook or LinkedIn page. The article should be available to the Internet. To class your article, we will check the popularity of your blog and the quality of the content. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io  6. Financial forum treads – 3%  If you administer or moderate a forum, you can create a thread dedicated to Serenity project. Your post must not be shorter than 1000 characters with spaces. The post must not contain any negative feedback on the project. The post must be constructive and adequate. You can create a thread on the forum, publish a post about Serenity and keep it active during the campaign. 1, 2 or 3 points will be awarded for each post. If we see that there is lots of spam and trolls in the discussion, the points will not be awarded. At the end of the campaign the following criteria will be used to estimate the quality of the forum: theme, age, number of visits, and total amount of posts. If the forum has less than 5000 visits a month, the points will not be awarded. If the forum has 5000 to 10 000 visits a month, 1 point for each post will be awarded and 2 points will be awarded if the amount of visits ranges from 10 000 to 30 000. If the number of monthly visits is over 30 000, 3 points will be awarded for each post. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io  7. Banner campaign – 10%  If you are an owner of a financial forum or a website, you can place Serenity banners there. For every 10 banner views 1 point will be awarded. Зapeгиcтpиpyйтe в partner’s Personal Area where you will be able to choose any banner and size and place the banner’s code on your website. After the ICO is ended, all the results will be summed up and the tokens will be divided among all the program participants. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io. We will send you the banners.   8. Financial forum signature campaign – 2%    o   Minimum of 25 messages during the full length of the campaign. o   30% of the posts must be about Serenity and the total amount of links must not be less than 2% from the total amount of posts. o   Age of the forum account must not be less than 4 months. o   You must have at least 10 posts of the forum to participate in the campaign. o   Receiving negative trust or ban during your participation in our campaign will result in you being disqualified from our campaign receiving nothing. o   If we feel you are making a lot of spam posts, you will be removed from the campaign and receive no payment. o   In your profile signature a link to Serenity must be present. o   Serenity logo must be uploaded as your profile picture (forum avatar). o   Do not change the signature during campaign. To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io   9. Youtube campaign – 10%  You can make a video review of Serenity Project and participate in our Youtube campaign! o   1000 to 4999 – 10 points o   5000 to 14 999 – 30 points o   15000 to 29 999 – 50 points o   30 000 to 49 999 – 100 points o   From 50 000 — 250 points  If the channel is about finance, we add additional 30 points.  The video must be about the project: tell about nature of the project, which problem it addresses, how to invest, about advantages for investors. The video must contain logo, the company’s name and the website address.  To make sure that no one publishes your video before you do, each video must be uploaded under a private mode first and the link submitted in the Private Office of Serenity website. After that is done, the video may be made public  To participate you need to register in the Private Account of Serenity at any moment before the end of the ICO and add links in the appropriate section or send a request to ambassador@serenity-financial.io How you can receive your bounties.  After the ICO ends, your final amount of points will be visible in your Serenity account. We will distribute 3% Serenity tokens in proportion to the amount of points each bounty campaign participant has earned in each category. For example, after counting all Twitter retweets, we will make a table where everyone who reposted will see their personal bounty points earned in the Twitter category. Since there are Serenity points dedicated to the Twitter category, those points will be distributed between all members participating the bounty campaign according to the amount of points they have earned. Then we will continue to the Facebook category, then BTT Signature campaign, etc. To summarize, the points earned in each campaign will NOT be pooled together but rather the points in each category will be divided in each category separately.  The information about points already earned is displayed in your Serenity account. It is updated every 48 hours.  Once all of the points are counted, you will see your Serenity points in your Serenity account.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Market actors for whom SERENITY FINANCIAL is created  Brokers:  All companies providing online trading on the currency and crypto exchanges.  Two categories of brokers will be present in the system:  Category A Broker —providing repayment guarantees for the full amount of funds invested  by  the  client,  taking  into  account  the  profits  /  losses  under  completed  transactions.  These  guarantees  will  be  implemented  by  hedging  trading  risks  through an open source and / or through the provided liquidity of the system.  Category B Broker — guaranteeing the return of own deposited funds of the client, taking into account the losses on trading operations.  Traders  Private investors, participants of speculative trading on the currency markets who place particular importance on the accuracy of trade execution, speed of transaction processing and an honest and quick withdrawal of funds.  Introducing Brokers  Partners of brokerage companies who place importance on the reliability of interaction with the broker, on the accuracy and timeliness of settlements.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: Serenity Financial — the first blockchain-based arbitration platform for Forex market!  The project that will change the Forex market  A revolution is coming for those who trade Forex or Binary Options. Serenity Financial is the first marketplace for brokers and traders based on Ethereum blockchain. Marketplace is a platform that processes all transactions between brokers and traders. All trading and non-trading transactions are recorded in blockchain, which guarantees transparency and eliminates the possibility of forgery. The platform stores clients’ funds and acts as an arbitrator in disputes, guarantees security and return of funds.  Why is our project relevant?  Trading volumes of today’s Forex market reach billions of dollars. Thousands of brokers serve as intermediaries for millions of traders around the globe, while only 10% of these brokers are regulated. The market is practically on its own — no standards, no evaluation criteria, no transparency or guarantees. Even choosing a broker is a huge gamble for a trader.  The project acts as a marketplace.  A trader registers with Serenity, connects to any certified broker from the pool, purchases tokens and transfers them to the broker that then provides the trader with an equivalent amount in the account currency. Trader starts placing trades while their funds remain on Serenity accounts and all trades and transactions are recorded in blockchain. When the trader closes a trade, they can submit a claim to our arbitration committee if they suspect any interference from the broker.  All trades are recorded in blockchain, thus the arbitration committee can always review the trading terminal data and establish irrefutable evidence whether the trade was executed correctly. If it was not, Serenity obliges the broker to reimburse the client. Everything is 100% transparent. First, Serenity Platform will be integrated with major trading platforms MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5 and then with other trading platforms.  Who works on the project?  The team behind Serenity Financial has already launched several successful projects: Grand Capital Forex broker with monthly turnover of $4,7M and a brokerage software provider UpTrader. Why are we sure that Serenity will reinvent the Forex industry?  We are creating an environment where all participants feel completely protected. Brokers will get liquidity easily and on favorable terms, as well as guarantee transparency for traders and thus attract additional funds.  Let’s change the Forex industry together!  Pre-ICO starts as early as 15th of November. Join us!  Subscribe to our news!  Project website: serenity-financial.io Telegram channel: @SerenityFinancial Facebook page: Serenity Financial Email: mail@serenity-financial.io

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: It's time to say some words about:  Problem description At the present moment in time, about 6,000 brokers provide Internet trading services through the MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5 platforms. According to average estimates, about 4,000,000 traders have trading accounts in those brokerage companies. But only 10% of brokers from this number have a license to provide intermediary services on the financial markets. Most of the new brokers do not become licensed which is due to a complicated procedure, stringent requirements and high costs of about $ 200,000 - $ 400,000 which small companies cannot afford at the initial stage.  Over the years of the industry's existence, and against the backdrop of weak regulation and lack of clear standards, the industry has acquired an ambiguous reputation. New companies face difficulties in attracting customers while customers risk losing their deposits due to improper or ill-advised actions of the broker. For the past several decades, the arrangements of working with the account and of the processing of trading operations on the accounts of traders have not undergone any significant changes. The system remains closed and nontransparent. Brokers continue to have the technical ability to influence information regarding trading accounts, to freeze funds, to recalculate profits, to deny payment orders and to use client funds for non-intended purposes. In this regard, the non-transparency of the system creates difficulties for serious market participants or actors and favorable conditions for fraud. And it also provides ample opportunities for unfair competition among companies, for manipulating the reputation of competitors with the help of anti-PR tools.  At the same time, speculative trade on the difference in exchange rates remains one of the most profitable and continues to attract millions of people. An important aspect is the wide range of investments that exist, especially with respect to innovative investments: trade in crypto-currencies (brokers and stock exchanges with margin trading), trade in binary options. These areas are even less protected from the point of view of a private investor. For this reason the financial industry badly needs new technologies of regulation. To change the situation, you have to radically change the approach. What is needed here is a single transparent regulatory system created on the basis of blockchain tech.

Author: Serenity_financial
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🚀$2 000 000 raised 🚀 Serenity - Escrow🌟. Arbitration⭐. Exchange📈
Body: There are a lot of rumors and negative reviews of the Forex market. They are concerned with unfair brokers, who resort to fraudulent manipulations with deals which a client did not even conduct. This unfair business practice results in huge client’s losses.   Just imagine that the daily turnover of the market is about $ 5,000,000,000,000. There are major players - market makers who create the main movement in the markets. However, there are thousands of brokers and millions of traders who try to make money on these movements while 90% of brokers in this market work without a license and some of these brokers seek to get benefit at the expense of other players.  Undoubtedly, the dealings conducted by some major brokers are strictly regulated but some smaller companies work without a license simply because it is too expensive to get it (1 - 2 million US dollars). Moreover, it is a well-known fact that even the possession of a license does not always save a trader from illegal actions of a broker. Thus, the underlying problem of the forex market is a lack of customer trust. The unscrupulous brokers inflict damage to the whole market and undermine the credibility of the companies operating in good faith.  As you may have guessed, an obvious solution to this problem is blockchain, which allow to register all transactions without a possibility to change them backdated and store client's money in a depository, which is not accessible to any broker. What could be more simple and reliable for today? That is how the Serenity project was launched - the first arbitration platform with segregated accounts for forex brokers and traders.
